author: Toye Johnson
comment: Although i liked this on my Huawei,and Zenwatch 2 smartwatches  and it looked just as good as the phone and tablet app. I had to uninstall it because  the background customization and watch face options havent worked in the settings, fix this and definitely will reinstall
title: Had to uninstall

author: Bri Robertson
comment: Really nice...... Any chance on being able to change the colour of the clocks and perhaps an option for the length of time the screen stays on in any future updates ? Also...... Great whites would look pretty cool 😂

author: Ra Cofi
comment: Sencilla pero muy funcional gracias por esta aplicacion
title: Excellent good job

author: Darin Ayler
comment: It's been a great watch face and worked well until I got a new phone and had to reset watch. Now it has a black gap on the top like on the bottom of my 360.  Any ideas?
title: Love it

author: Curt Myers
comment: It's nice like the version for phones and tablets... But it keeps freezing up my Moto 360.... Always gives me an application not responding... But it's nice...
title: It's ok...

author: Andy Clayton
comment: It's a good face but I found its very heavy on the battery on my sony smart watch 3 a shame or it would be 5 stars
title: Koi watch face

author: Vinnie De Vitto
comment: Looks great works great hope to see more on wear from you guys it's cool  edit* ambient mode cause the the moto 360 to freeze needing a restart please fix this problem
title: Awesome

author: Rob Newlin
comment: Awesome watch face on my lg g watch.  Lots of customization.  So worth a buck.  I hope you guys port some of your other phone wallpaper to the watch.  I own nearly everything you've made for live wallpaper.
title: My favorite watch face so far

author: Martin Bentley
comment: A great clock face with fully moving fish.and a choice of options to change fish type and backgrounds.would be nice to have numbers on face screen.hopefully on next update.keep up the good work.
title: Looks watch face

author: Jane Daw
comment: Please help as i cant find it.thank you.

author: Dervi Hernandez
comment: Nice 2 c u guys working on Android wear.
title: Moto 360

author: Ric Brook
comment: Dire animation and nothing like the live wallpaper. Save your money...
title: Rubbish!

author: Nick Jeffery
comment: Great idea, and really shows off the watch, but eats battery life.
title: Ok on Sony SmartWatch 3

author: Tracy McKee
comment: I installed it but it was no where to be found to I asked for a refund!  I am running Android 6.0
title: Where is it?
